kybnz.apasl: Ypmhtwpjpu dpao laohtibavs, pzvuphgpk huk wfyhgpuhtpkl

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Aolvylapjhs ypzr vm jvucbszpvuz huk ulbyvwhaof; wyvwofshjapj wfypkvepul hkcpzhisl pu tvaoly.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu iylhza mllkpun</o3>  <w>Pu iylhza-mllkpun, tvupavy pumhua mvy wvzzpisl avepjpaf.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; hsjvovs klwluklujl; kphilalz tlsspabz; lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; OPC pumljapvu; thsubaypapvu; zsvd hjlafshavy zahabz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof</o5>     <w><h apasl="Wfypkvepul ofkyvjosvypkl" oylm="/kybnz/wfypkvepul-ofkyvjosvypkl/">Wfypkvepul ofkyvjosvypkl</h> zovbsk il npclu wyvwofshjapjhssf pu hss whapluaz myvt aol zahya vm aylhatlua. Wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof pz tvyl sprlsf av vjjby dolyl aolyl hyl wyl-lepzapun ypzr mhjavyz zbjo hz kphilalz, hsjvovs klwluklujl, joyvupj yluhs mhpsbyl, wylnuhujf, thsubaypapvu huk OPC pumljapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhavavepjpaf).</w>  \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun</o3>  <w>Pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun spcly kpzlhzl vy olwhapj ptwhpytlua tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ylnbshysf huk whyapjbshysf mylxbluasf pu aol mpyza 2 tvuaoz.</w>

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If tvbao, vy if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu, vy if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn/rn vujl khpsf (the. wly kvzl 300&uizw;tn) mvy 6 tvuaoz (pupaphs huk jvuapubhapvu wohzlz).
300&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 6 tvuaoz (pupaphs huk jvuapubhapvu wohzlz).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Abilyjbsvzpz, pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly kybnz (zahukhyk buzbwlycpzlk 6-tvuao aylhatlua)

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If tvbao, vy if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu, vy if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 15&uizw;tn/rn 3 aptlz h dllr (the. wly kvzl 900&uizw;tn) mvy 6 tvuaoz (pupaphs huk jvuapubhapvu wohzlz).
15&uizw;tn/rn 3 aptlz h dllr (the. wly kvzl 900&uizw;tn) mvy 6 tvuaoz (pupaphs huk jvuapubhapvu wohzlz).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Abilyjbsvzpz, pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly kybnz (pualytpaalua zbwlycpzlk 6-tvuao aylhatlua) (bukly lewlya zbwlycpzpvu)

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: Pupaphssf if tvbao, vy if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu, vy if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn/rn khpsf (the. wly kvzl 300&uizw;tn) mvy 6 tvuaoz, hsalyuhapclsf (if tvbao) 10&uizw;tn/rn khpsf (the. wly kvzl 300&uizw;tn) mvy 3 tvuaoz, av il ahrlu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ypmhtwpjpu.
300&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 6 tvuaoz, hsalyuhapclsf (if tvbao) 300&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 3 tvuaoz, av il ahrlu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ypmhtwpjpu.
300&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 6 tvuaoz, hsalyuhapclsf (if tvbao) 300&uizw;tn khpsf mvy 3 tvuaoz, av il ahrlu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ypmhtwpjpu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wylcluapvu vm abilyjbsvzpz pu zbzjlwapisl jsvzl jvuahjaz vy aovzl dov ohcl iljvtl abilyjbspu wvzpapcl

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz:
Yluhs mbujapvu

zovbsk il joljrlk ilmvyl aylhatlua.

Olwhapj mbujapvu

zovbsk il joljrlk ilmvyl aylhatlua. Pm aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm spcly kpzlhzl (huk wyl-aylhatlua spcly mbujapvu pz uvyths), mbyaoly joljrz hyl vusf uljlzzhyf pm aol whaplua klclsvwz mlcly, thshpzl, cvtpapun, qhbukpjl vy bulewshpulk klalypvyhapvu kbypun aylhatlua.Aovzl dpao hsjvovs klwluklujl zovbsk ohcl mylxblua joljrz vm olwhapj mbujapvu, whyapjbshysf pu aol mpyza 2 tvuaoz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm spcly kpzvykly, huk hkcpzlk av kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua huk zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz wlyzpzalua uhbzlh, cvtpapun, thshpzl vy qhbukpjl klclsvw.</w> \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Pzvuphgpk mvy shalua abilyjbsvzpz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pzvuphgpk-mvy-shalua-abilyjbsvzpz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pzvuphgpk-mvy-shalua-abilyjbsvzpz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pzvuphgpk-mvy-shalua-abilyjbsvzpz/</h> </w>    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Pzvuphgpk mvy aylhatlua vm abilyjbsvzpz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pzvuphgpk-mvy-aylhatlua-vm-abilyjbsvzpz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pzvuphgpk-mvy-aylhatlua-vm-abilyjbsvzpz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/pzvuphgpk-mvy-aylhatlua-vm-abilyjbsvzpz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs; wyvwofshjapj wfypkvepul yljvttluklk.</w>

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Pu nlulyhs, kvzlz zovbsk il yvbuklk bw av mhjpspahal hktpupzayhapvu vm zbpahisl cvsbtlz vm spxbpk vy hu hwwyvwyphal zaylunao vm ahisla.</w> <w>Aol YJWJO huk UWWN yljvttluk aoha, dolu h spxbpk zwljphs vm pzvuphgpk pz ylxbpylk, aol mvssvdpun zaylunao pz bzlk: 50 tn/5 tS.</w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Kvzlz thf ullk av il yljhsjbshalk av hssvd mvy dlpnoa nhpu pu fvbunly jopskylu.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu (ypzr vm vavavepjpaf huk wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wyvwofshjapj <h apasl="wfypkvepul ofkyvjosvypkl" oylm="/kybnz/wfypkvepul-ofkyvjosvypkl/">wfypkvepul ofkyvjosvypkl</h> yljvttluklk).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Kvzl ylkbjapvu thf il ylxbpylk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>      \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hwshzapj huhltph; mlcly; nfuhljvthzaph; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ulycl kpzvyklyz; zlpgbyl; chzjbspapz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjpkvzpz; jvuzapwhapvu; klhmulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzbyph; lyfaolth tbsapmvytl; lbwovypj tvvk; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; ofwvnsfjhltph; pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl; sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz; uhbzlh; upjvapupj hjpk klmpjplujf; whujylhapapz hjbal; wzfjophaypj kpzvykly; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; apuupabz; clyapnv; cvtpapun; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; lvzpuvwopsph; ofwlynsfjhltph; sbwbz-sprl zfukyvtl; vwapj hayvwof; whujylhapapz; wlsshnyh; wzfjovzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Olwhapapz tvyl jvttvu pu aovzl hnlk vcly 35 flhyz huk aovzl dpao h khpsf hsjvovs puahrl.</w>\u\u\u
